title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.38 - Charge; amendment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.38 - Charge; amendment

State Regulations

The director of PEPR or hearing officer designated by the
director of PEPR may permit a charging party to amend the charge at any time
prior to issuance of a decision or dismissal upon such terms as may be deemed
just and consistent with due process. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.38

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
